body:
This fix helps with the issue mentioned here:

https://github.com/mariochavez/chroma/issues/29

`message=Client error response code=400 body={"error":"InvalidArgumentError","message":"Expected where to have exactly one operator, got {}"} (InvalidArgumentError (Chroma::APIError)`
@andreibondarev no problem! I saw that one test failed so please wait for the update.
There is a new release of Chroma gem that updates the API change for this.
